headline.print_headline: Wasteful Leverkusen's Perfect Start Ends With Draw
headline.main: Wasteful Leverkusen's Perfect Start Ends With Draw

docs.snippet: Bundesliga leaders Bayer Leverkusen drew 3-3 against Werder Bremen in a rollercoaster game on Friday to see their perfect start to the season end following two victories....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bundesliga leaders Bayer Leverkusen drew 3-3 against Werder Bremen in a rollercoaster game on Friday to see their perfect start to the season end following two victories.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Uses State Secrets Law to Intervene in Iran-Related Lawsuit
headline.main: U.S. Uses State Secrets Law to Intervene in Iran-Related Lawsuit

docs.snippet: The U.S. government has moved to invoke a powerful national security law to dismiss a private lawsuit against a non-profit group, United Against A Nuclear Iran, on grounds that the case could reveal state secrets, according to a court filing on Fr...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. government has moved to invoke a powerful national security law to dismiss a private lawsuit against a non-profit group, United Against A Nuclear Iran, on grounds that the case could reveal state secrets, according to a court filing on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Hawks General Manager Takes Leave of Absence After Making Racial Comments
headline.main: Hawks General Manager Takes Leave of Absence After Making Racial Comments

docs.snippet: Atlanta Hawks General Manager Danny Ferry, under fire for making racially charged remarks, has taken an indefinite leave of absence, the NBA team said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Atlanta Hawks General Manager Danny Ferry, under fire for making racially charged remarks, has taken an indefinite leave of absence, the NBA team said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Teen Sentenced to 20 Years for Fatal Stabbing
headline.main: Teen Sentenced to 20 Years for Fatal Stabbing

docs.snippet: A Houston-area teenager was sentenced Friday to 20 years in prison for the fatal stabbing of another teen during a high school cafeteria fight last year that also left three others injured....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Houston-area teenager was sentenced Friday to 20 years in prison for the fatal stabbing of another teen during a high school cafeteria fight last year that also left three others injured.

headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Friday
headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Friday

docs.snippet: The stock market logged its first weekly loss since early August on Friday after a report showed that retail sales in August rose more than economists had forecast. That reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve could start hiking interest ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The stock market logged its first weekly loss since early August on Friday after a report showed that retail sales in August rose more than economists had forecast. That reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve could start hiking interest rates sooner than expected.

headline.print_headline: Lawyers for Migrants? Administration Says Yes, No
headline.main: Lawyers for Migrants? Administration Says Yes, No

docs.snippet: Attorney General Eric Holder is arguing publicly in favor of legal representation for migrant children arriving unaccompanied at the border — even as his department takes the opposite position in court....
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric Holder is arguing publicly in favor of legal representation for migrant children arriving unaccompanied at the border — even as his department takes the opposite position in court.
